text:
'PROMISING PRACTICES" - FILM 4
PAGE I
VIDEO
AUDIO
I. FULLSCREEN. TYRANNO- NARRATOR : (OFFSCREEN) This is
SAURUS REX. (MODEL OF
DINOSAUR) Tyrannosaurus rex. . .a dinosaur that
lived some two hundred fifty million
years ago.
CAMERA OPENS SCENE TO
REVEAL NARRATOR IN STUDY
SET. . . LOOKING AT MODEL
OF TYRANNOSAURUS REX. NARRATOR : (SYNC) I'm _
... a contemporary specimen of homo
sapiens.
NARRATOR PICKS UP THE
MODEL OF THE DINOSAUR
AND HOLDS IT UP BESIDE
HIM FOR COMPARISON. NARRATOR : (SYNC) Just at a glance. . .
I imagine you'd consider this fellow
here far the more impressive of the
two!
HE PUTS THE DINOSAUR
MODEL DOWN. CAMERA
MOVES IN ON CLOSE-UP
OF PICTURE.
CAMERA EXPLORES
MODEL'S DETAILS. MOVES
FROM THE DINOSAUR'S TAIL
TO HIS HEAD. THEN DOWN
TO HIS FORELEG CLAWS.
THEN DOWN TO HIS BODY
HIDE. THEN SHOWS FULL
LENGTH MODEL AGAIN. . .
AS CUED BY NARRATOR'S
REMARKS.
NARRATOR : (OFFSCREEN) And who
could blame you? Just look at him.
Eighty feet from tail to head. Teeth
a foot long. Claws with the bite of a
steam shovel. His own hide an
impenetrable armor. Looks invincible,
doe sn't he ?
But he wasn't!
